name: Live Well Advance 2023
description: Nearly 2,000 people attended the 2023 Live Well Advance Conference & School Summit, making it the biggest one yet in its eight-year history.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Nearly 2,000 people attended the 2023 Live Well Advance Conference & School Summit, making it the biggest one yet in its eight-year history. The all-day conference was held at the San Diego Convention Center and focused on connecting for community wellbeing. Thousands of partners and stakeholders spent the day networking, sharing information and best practices, and discussing issues in depth during breakout sessions.
The cost-free event was sponsored by Blue Shield Promise Health Plan and First 5 San Diego and made possible through partnerships between the County of San Diego, Alliance Healthcare Foundation and the San Diego County Office of Education. The intention was to help people make new connections and build a healthy, safe, and thriving San Diego region together.
